title: Smart Data models - UC1_ARKITE
description: A Data Model of the status of a production line UC1_ARKITE

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be ProductionLineStatus

timeStamp.description: Property. The timestamp of the production line status update

automatic.description: Property. Indicates whether the production line is in automatic or manual mode

lineSpeed.description: Property. The current speed mode of the production line (fast/slow)
